item.title: Meatballs
item.description: Ingredients 2 lb ground beef or lamb, or 50⁄50 of both 1 lb ground pork 1 slice of bread, very stale, shredded 1 large egg 2 tbsp each of: oregano sage garlic powder onion powder salt pepper Directions Preheat oven to 425F. Shred the stale bred with a fine grater, to crumbs. Mix with seasoning and egg. Mix very well with the ground meat. Use a disher appropriate to the size of desired meatball to portion out each meatball.
